data.question: What is the oxidation state of cerium in [Li3(DMEDA)3][(BINOLate)3Ce] (1–DMEDA)?
What is the color change observed upon addition of trityl chloride to the solution of [Li3(THF)4][(BINOLate)3Ce(THF)]·THF (1)?
data.answer: The solution changes from light yellow to dark purple.

data.question: What is the role of sodium azide in the synthesis of [Li3(THF)5][(BINOLate)3Ce–N3] (2–N3)?
data.answer: Sodium azide is used to introduce the azide group, resulting in the formation of the Ce-N3 bond.

data.question: What is the main difference in the electronic absorption spectra between 2–N3 and other 2–X compounds?
data.answer: 2–N3 displays a very different λmax for the LMCT, suggesting a different origin of the CT band.

data.question: What is the observed reaction order of TPPO in the oxidation of 1 with trityl chloride in the presence of varying equivalents of TPPO?
data.answer: The reaction order of TPPO is complicated, being inverse first order at low concentrations and inverse second order at higher concentrations.

data.question: What is the yield of [Li3(DMEDA)3][(BINOLate)3Ce–Cl]∙C5H12 (2–Cl(DMEDA)) when synthesized from 1?
What is the color of the crystals obtained for [Li3(DMEDA)3][(BINOLate)3Ce–Br] (2–Br(DMEDA))?
Is the oxidation of 1 with trityl chloride in the presence of TPPO an inner-sphere or outer-sphere process?
data.answer: The oxidation mechanism is proposed to be an inner-sphere process.

data.question: What is the function of sodium thiocyanate in the synthesis of [Li3(THF)5][(BINOLate)3Ce–NCS] (2–NCS)?
data.answer: Sodium thiocyanate is used to introduce the thiocyanate group, resulting in the formation of the Ce-NCS bond.

data.question: What is the main structural feature of {[Cs2][(BINOLate)3Ce]·DME}∞ (8)?
data.answer: It forms infinitely repeating helical chains.

data.question: True or False: The electronic absorption spectra of 2–N3 is similar to other 2–X compounds.
True or False: The reaction order of TPPO in the oxidation of 1 with trityl chloride is consistent across all concentrations.
True or False: The synthesis of [Li3(DMEDA)3][(BINOLate)3Ce–I] (2–I(DMEDA)) can also be achieved using N-iodosuccinimide.
True or False: The synthesis of [Li3(THF)5][(BINOLate)3Ce–NCS] (2–NCS) results in a color change from dark purple to light yellow.
True or False: The compound [Li3(DMEDA)3][(BINOLate)3Ce] (1–DMEDA) is paramagnetic.
True or False: The compound {[Cs3(THF)1.5][(BINOLate)3Ce]}2 (7) forms a dimeric structure in the solid state.
True or False: The compound {[K2(THF)4(BINOL)][(BINOLate)3Ce]}∞ (6–BINOL) displays fluxional behavior in solution.
True or False: The reaction of 1 with trityl chloride in the presence of TPPO is not affected by the concentration of TPPO.
True or False: The electronic absorption spectra of 2–OAr displays a charge transfer (CT) band similar to other 2–X compounds.
True or False: The compound [Li3(THF)5][(BINOLate)3Ce–N3] (2–N3) forms a monomeric structure in the solid state.
